widget.name: Microflow Timer (no context)
widget.description: Time based call microflow or nanoflow action

property.caption: Interval (in ms)
property.description: Defines how often the microflow or nanoflow is called. Note that the inteval is in milliseconds, so the default, 30000, equals 30 seconds. Note that, unless Execute Once is set to true, the microflow is invoked immediately after loading the form for the first time

property.caption: Execute once
property.description: If true, the microflow or nanoflow will be invoked only once, and interval defines after how many seconds

property.caption: Start at once
property.description: If true (and execute once is false), the microflow or nanoflow will be invoked the first time if the widget has loaded. If false, the microflow or nanoflow will be invoked the first time after interval has passed

property.caption: Microflow
property.description: The microflow to be executed. If the microflow returns false, it will not be executed any longer until the context changes

property.caption: Nanoflow
property.description: The nanoflow to be executed. If the nanoflow returns false, it will not be executed any longer until the context changes
